name: Kitty Chronicles Prototype Demo 0.1
description:
This version of the game is just a Prototype Demo meant to be played to experience the existing mechanics and art involved, as well as to share my design.

The finished idea of this game is meant to be played with your cat(s), as the moving characters encourage the cat to tap on the screen to help you win the game.

During a "TAP!!!" intermission, the plan is to put art that will move rapidly, my idea is to put one of those puff balls that wiggle around for the art, and have a few frames that make it look like its moving back and forth to encourage cats to tap with you.

I hope that you enjoy this project as it exists now. I plan to develop more to it as time passes, but this is what it will exist as for a while as I am a full time student and I have other projects I work on as well. Thank you for playing!
